page.title: 07Working at Aust Services
page.content: At Aust Services all the workers seemed to be very busy. We interviewed several workers and learnt that most employees lived between two and eight miles away and the company provided transport to and from work .A woman in the snack-bar said she worked from 8.30a.m to 5.30p.m.One of her assistants worked from 7.00a.m to 2.30p.m. A cashier said she worked eight hours a day but the time she had to start work varied. Because the services are open twenty-four hours a day ,employees work on a shift system. Those people we spoke to seemed to enjoy their work and meeting people.
